name: Breastplate of Petrified Wood
description: Worn on the torso, this item increases your Power skill by +1.

name: Armor of Wonder
description: Worn on the torso, the Armor of Wonder increases all four primary skills by +1.

name: Rib Cage
description: Worn about the neck, this necklace increases the combat speed of all your units by +1.

name: Scales of the Greater Basilisk
description: Wearing this item renders your units immune to the Destroy Undead spell.

name: Tunic of the Cyclops King
description: Wearing this item renders your units immune to the Hypnotize spell.

name: Breastplate of Brimstone
description: Wearing this item renders your units immune to the Berserk spell.

name: Dragon Scale Armor
description: Worn on a torso, this item increases your Attack and Defense skills by +4.

name: Titan's Cuirass
description: When worn, this massive relic increases your Power skill by +10, but reduces your Knowledge skill by -2.
